title: Ask A Farmer | Ep. 2 | Peach Farmer

tasks.task: Managing a peach orchard in Arkansas.
subtasks: Pruning peach trees in January and February.
Monitoring for potential freezes from bloom time through early summer.
Thinning peaches in April, May, June, and monitoring for overproduction.
Harvesting peaches during the July 4th weekend and throughout July.
Applying irrigation and weed control throughout the growing season.
Conducting fall maintenance to prepare for the following year, including pest management and spraying.
Answering public questions about peach production, including crop challenges, tree lifespan, and cultural practices.
